channel.title: bbcnews TikTok
channel.description: OK Boomer, all the latest TikToks from bbcnews

item.title: Replying to @Steve2814 The US House of Representatives approved the Epstein bill with a vote of 427-1, marking a rare moment of bipartisanship. #EpsteinFiles #JeffreyEpstein #USSenate #Epstein #CapitolHill

item.title: The US Congress has approved a measure to force the US Justice Department to release all files pertaining to its investigation into convicted paedophile Jeffrey Epstein. #EpsteinFiles #JeffreyEpstein #USSenate #Epstein #CapitolHill #USNews #BBCNews
item.description: The US Congress has approved a measure to force the US Justice Department to release all files pertaining to its investigation into convicted paedophile Jeffrey Epstein. #EpsteinFiles #JeffreyEpstein #USSenate #Epstein #CapitolHill #USNews #BBCNews

item.title: The bill requires the justice department to release all information from its Epstein investigation "in a searchable and downloadable format" within 30 days. #DonaldTrump #EpsteinFiles #US #BreakingNews #BBCNews
item.description: The bill requires the justice department to release all information from its Epstein investigation "in a searchable and downloadable format" within 30 days. #DonaldTrump #EpsteinFiles #US #BreakingNews #BBCNews

item.title: President Trump called for his own party to vote to release the files, after weeks spent claiming the vote was a distraction led by the Democratic Party. #DonaldTrump #EpsteinFiles #MarjorieTaylorGreene #USPolitics #BBCNews
item.description: President Trump called for his own party to vote to release the files, after weeks spent claiming the vote was a distraction led by the Democratic Party. #DonaldTrump #EpsteinFiles #MarjorieTaylorGreene #USPolitics #BBCNews

item.title: Hertfordshire Police said the man, who was arrested last month, had been released on bail under investigation. According to the Sun, the man is alleged to have raped a woman after a BBC event. It is understood not to be related to the show's current serie

item.title: Ex-leader of Reform UK in Wales Nathan Gill is being sentenced for taking bribes as part of a pro-Russia influence campaign. He was paid thousands of pounds to favour a Putin ally on TV and make speeches in the European Parliament. #NathanGill #Reform #Re
item.description: Ex-leader of Reform UK in Wales Nathan Gill is being sentenced for taking bribes as part of a pro-Russia influence campaign. He was paid thousands of pounds to favour a Putin ally on TV and make speeches in the European Parliament. #NathanGill #Reform #Re

item.title: Nathan Gill has been sentenced to 10-and-a-half years for taking pro-Russia bribes as part of a pro-Russia influence campaign. #NathanGill #Reform #ReformUK #Russia #Ukraine #UkraineWar #UKPolitics #Putin #BBCNews

item.title: Simone White was one of six tourists who died after drinking free shots at a hostel in Vang Vieng. It is thought those drinks were tainted with methanol, a toxic substance that is sometimes mixed with alcohol illegally to cut costs. #Methanol #Laos #VangV
item.description: Simone White was one of six tourists who died after drinking free shots at a hostel in Vang Vieng. It is thought those drinks were tainted with methanol, a toxic substance that is sometimes mixed with alcohol illegally to cut costs. #Methanol #Laos #VangV
